metadata.synopsis: One-linerSteel Watchers in the Streets minibooster.At Docks roadOne of dock delivery folk - NOTE Please rename to Kolobeg.

0.speaker: Kolobeg
0.text: Frankly, I'm reconsidering whether I want to make deliveries in a neighbourhood where buildings suddenly explode.

1.speaker: Kolobeg
1.text: I swear, this Fist is just trying to provoke me, but I'm not going to fall for it.
